attributes.action: Raise salary of HMRC employees by 5% p.a for 3 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petition to raise the salary of the HMRC employees by 5% p.a for 3 years in accordance with inflation levels and the level of pay that they should receive for the job they do. They have been promised pay rises before but are always met with pay freezes , something which will happen in the next budget.
